{"name": "Alliance Center for Independence (ACI)", "alternate_name": "", "description": " Serving disabled low-income families that reside in Middlesex, Union and Somerset counties up to 
twice a month by appointment only after application approval 
APPOINTMENT ONLY. Please call 732-738-4388 to schedule an appointment. We cannot accommodate Walk-Ins.
Need help applying for SNAP or have questions? Our trained SNAP Navigators will help you through the process. Please contact us at 732-738-4388 or lkoppisch@adacil.org", "email": "", "url": "https://www.adacil.org/community-market", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "629 Amboy Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Edison", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08837", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.52907769999999, "longitude": -74.3173853}, "phones": [{"number": "(732) 738-4388", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Client choice pantry"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "SNAP assistance available"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Only caters to families with a member that has disability"}]}
